pony.events.Signal

Example: 
  var signal:Signal = new Signal();
  signal.addListener(function() trace('hi'));
  signal.dispatch();
  ----------
  hi
If addListener after dispatch, you can write: 
  var signal:Signal = new Signal(0);
  signal.dispatch();
  signal.addListener(function() trace('hi'));
  ----------
  hi
And this work!
authors
AxGord
type
class
implements
pony.magic.ArgsArray


Static Variables

__meta__ : Dynamic

Constructor

new(?delay : Int)
parameters
delay Delay for dispatch in ms. Default -1. -1 - run without wait.
see
pony.SpeedLimit

Instance Variables

delay(getDelay,setDelay) : Int

Delay for dispatch in ms. Default -1. -1 - run without wait.
see
SpeedLimit

dispatch : Dynamic

Example: 
      dispatch(new Event());
      dispatch();
      dispatch(1, 2, 3);

Instance Methods

addListener(?l : Listener, ?he : Event -> Void, ?hd : Dynamic, ?count : Int, ?priority : Int, ?delay : Int) : Void

Examples: 
      signal.addListener(new Listener(function() trace('hi')));
      
      signal.addListener(function() trace('hi'));
      
      signal.addListener(function(event:Event) trace(event));
Call with l or he or hd
parameters
count Limit runs. If 0 then unlimited. Default 0.
priority Default 0.
delay Delay for call in ms. Default -1. -1 - run without wait.
see
pony.SpeedLimit for param delay
pony.Priority for param priority.
pony.events.Listener
pony.events.Event

changePriority(?l : Listener, ?he : Event -> Void, ?hd : Dynamic, ?p : Int) : Void

Send Listener or Event->Void or Function
parameters
p new priority, default 0
see
pony.Priority for param priority.

dynamic haveListener() : Void

dynamic lostListener() : Void

removeAllListeners() : Void

removeListener(?l : Listener, ?he : Event -> Void, ?hd : Dynamic) : Void

Send only one argument: Listener or Event->Void or Function

wait(?l : Listener, ?he : Event -> Void, ?hd : Dynamic) : Void

waitAsync(ok : Event -> Void, ?error : Dynamic -> Void) : Void
